text: The Angled Darkie (Allotinus fabius) is a small butterfly. It is found in India, Myanmar and South East Asia.Page on Marrku Savela's site for genus Allotinus (Lycaenidae).Evans,W.H.(1932) The Identification of Indian Butterflies, ser no H6.6, pp 212 It belongs to the Lycaenidae family. ==References== Category:Lycaenidae
title: Allotinus fabius
